mapper.select: SELECT r.id,s.store_id storeId,s.table_code tableCode,r.people_count peopleCount,FROM_UNIXTIME(r.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') createTime,r.order_id orderId from runtime_table r right join store_table s on r.table_code = s.table_code and r.store_id = s.store_id and s.store_id =#{storeId};
mapper.update: update runtime_table set order_id = #{orderId} where table_code = #{tableCode} and store_id = #{storeId}
